GS40rasarnpu:1096: rasāyane tu yogyaḥ syād vayaḥstambhakaro bhavet // Ras_7.44 //
GS40rasarnpu:1102: ekaikaṃ tridinaṃ paktvā śikhipittena bhāvayet // Ras_7.48 //
GS40rasarnpu:1104: sattvaṃ tu sūtasaṃkāśaṃ jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ras_7.49 //
GS40rasarnpu:1109: kimatra citraṃ daradaḥ subhāvitaḥ kṣīreṇa meṣyā bahuśo 'mlavargaiḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:1110: sitaṃ suvarṇaṃ bahugharmatāpitaṃ karoti sākṣādvarakuṅkumaprabham // Ras_7.52 //
GS40rasarnpu:1112: ghṛṣṭaṃ tu gairikacchāyaṃ srotojaṃ suravandite // Ras_7.53 //
GS40rasarnpu:1114: bhāvitaṃ bahuśastacca kṣipraṃ badhnāti sūtakam // Ras_7.54 //
GS40rasarnpu:1115: evaṃ mahārasāḥ proktāḥ śṛṇuṣvoparasān priye // Ras_7.55 //
GS40rasarnpu:1117: rājāvartaśca kaṅkuṣṭham aṣṭā uparasāḥ smṛtāḥ // Ras_7.56 //

GS40rasarnpu:1129: ūrmibhiste rajovastraṃ nītaṃ madhye payonidheḥ // Ras_7.62 //
GS40rasarnpu:1130: evaṃ te śoṇitaṃ bhadre praviṣṭaṃ kṣīrasāgare /

GS40rasarnpu:1143: bhṛṅgāmbhasā vā saptāhaṃ bhāvitaḥ kṣālito 'mbhasā // Ras_7.69 //

GS40rasarnpu:1148: gandhakaṃ śodhayet kṣīre śṛṅgaverarase tathā // Ras_7.72 //
GS40rasarnpu:1149: rase ca bhṛṅgarājasya nimbukasya rase tathā /

GS40rasarnpu:1152: kuṣmāṇḍe tu śataṃ vārān tālakaṃ svedayedbudhaḥ // Ras_7.74 //

GS40rasarnpu:1159: dadyāt puṭaṃ gajākāraṃ patet sattvaṃ sutālakāt // Ras_7.77 //

GS40rasarnpu:1162: sitā kṛṣṇā ca saurāṣṭrī cūrṇakhaṇḍātmikā ca sā // Ras_7.79 //

GS40rasarnpu:1189: chāgakṣīreṇa saṃyuktaṃ vajrapiṇḍī tu kīrtitā // Ras_7.93 //
GS40rasarnpu:1192: koṣṭhe kharāgninā dhmātāḥ sattvaṃ muñcanti suvrate /

GS40rasarnpu:1195: suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ tāmraṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vaṅgaṃ bhujaṃgamam /

GS40rasarnpu:1198: sādhāraṇe tīkṣṇaśulve vaṅganāgau tu pūtikau // Ras_7.98 //

GS40rasarnpu:1201: raktābhaṃ pītavarṇaṃ ca dvividhaṃ devi kāñcanam /

GS40rasarnpu:1207: śuklaṃ ca tārakṛṣṇaṃ ca dvividhaṃ rajataṃ priye /

GS40rasarnpu:1218: guḍūcī haṃsapādī ca naktamālaḥ phalatrayam // Ras_7.108 //

GS40rasarnpu:1238: akhilāni ca sattvāni drāvayet tatprabhāvataḥ // Ras_7.119 //

GS40rasarnpu:1301: haranti rogān sakalān rasayuktāni kiṃ punaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:1304: nāgaṃ vaṅgaṃ suvīraṃ ca dravyakarmaṇi yojayet // Ras_7.152 //
GS40rasarnpu:1305: paribālaṃ tu yallohaṃ tathā ca malayodbhavam /
GS40rasarnpu:1312: rāgasaṃkhyāṃ tathā bīja- sādhanaṃ ca vada prabho // Ras_8.1 //
GS40rasarnpu:1315: giridoṣe kṣayaṃ nīte sūtakaṃ rañjayanti te // Ras_8.2 //

GS40rasarnpu:1324: dvādaśāgraṃ śataṃ pañca nāge rāgā vyavasthitāḥ /

GS40rasarnpu:1349: śuddhaṃ miśraṃ tu saṃyogāt yathālābhaṃ sureśvari // Ras_8.19 //

GS40rasarnpu:1402: vāpitaṃ sevitaṃ rakta- gaṇaiḥ snehairmṛtaṃ tataḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:1404: kevalaṃ vimalaṃ tāmraṃ vāpitaṃ daradena ca /

GS40rasarnpu:1407: kṛṣṇābhrakasya cūrṇaṃ ca raktavargair muhuḥ puṭaiḥ // Ras_8.46 //
GS40rasarnpu:1408: tāpyena vā mṛtaṃ hema triguṇena nivāpitam /

GS40rasarnpu:1412: abhrakaṃ hema tāmraṃ ca śilayā mākṣikeṇa ca /

GS40rasarnpu:1420: rañjane rasarājasya sāraṇāyāṃ ca śasyate // Ras_8.53 //
GS40rasarnpu:1422: adhikaṃ śasyate teṣu sahasrāṃśena vedhakṛt // Ras_8.54 //
GS40rasarnpu:1424: khasattvaṃ raviṇā yojyaṃ dvaṃdvitaṃ syādrasāyane // Ras_8.55 //

GS40rasarnpu:1447: dvātriṃśadguṇitaṃ hemni nāgaṃ tāpyaṃ hataṃ vahet /
GS40rasarnpu:1450: bīje nirvāhayed etat yoṣāmṛṣṭasya vedhakam // Ras_8.67 //
GS40rasarnpu:1451: nāgaḥ karoti mṛdutāṃ nirvyūḍhastāṃ ca raktatām /
GS40rasarnpu:1452: vāpitaṃ pītatāṃ tīkṣṇaṃ kāntasthāṃ kālikāṃ viṣam // Ras_8.68 //

GS40rasarnpu:1471: bhāvitaṃ kharparasthaṃ ca plāvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ /

GS40rasarnpu:1481: kvāthe caturguṇe kṣīre tailamekaṃ sureśvari // Ras_8.82 //
GS40rasarnpu:1485: vasayā caikayā yuktaṃ ṣoḍaśāṃśaiḥ supeṣitaiḥ // Ras_8.84 //
GS40rasarnpu:1487: pācitaṃ gālitaṃ caitat sāraṇā tailamucyate // Ras_8.85 //
GS40rasarnpu:1488: rasatulyaṃ yathā bījaṃ gataṃ garbhadrutiṃ priye /

GS40rasarnpu:1495: bījānāṃ kalanaṃ proktaṃ viśeṣeṇa ca sādhanam /

GS40rasarnpu:1502: puṭitaṃ bahuśo devi praśasto jāraṇāviḍaḥ // Ras_9.3 //

GS40rasarnpu:1508: cūlikā gandhapāṣāṇaḥ kāntasya ca mukhaṃ priye /

GS40rasarnpu:1517: dagdhakāṇḍais tilānāṃ tu pañcāṅgaṃ mūlakasya ca // Ras_9.11 //

GS40rasarnpu:1526: cūlikāgandhakāsiktau dvau viḍau śataśaḥ kramāt // Ras_9.15 //
GS40rasarnpu:1531: gandhakaḥ śataśo bhāvyo viḍo 'yaṃ hemajāraṇe // Ras_9.17 //
GS40rasarnpu:1538: rasasya lakṣaṇaṃ kiṃvā rasakarma ca kīdṛśam /

GS40rasarnpu:1543: śakyate na mayā vaktuṃ saṃkṣepāt kathyate śṛṇu // Ras_10.3 //

GS40rasarnpu:1546: nāśayet sakalān rogān valīpalitameva saḥ // Ras_10.5 //

GS40rasarnpu:2425: sthānasyāsya niṣekaṃ tu bhūdaṇḍena tu kārayet // Ras_12.164 //
GS40rasarnpu:2429: bhagnam etacchravet kṣīraṃ raktavarṇaṃ suśobhanam // Ras_12.167 //
GS40rasarnpu:2433: tasya kṣīraṃ tu saṃgṛhya tāraṃ nirvāpayedbudhaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2434: dhameddhavāgninā caiva jāyate hema śobhanam // Ras_12.169 //
GS40rasarnpu:2436: mardayet pāradaṃ prājño rasabandho bhaviṣyati // Ras_12.170 //
GS40rasarnpu:2437: toyamadhye vinikṣipya guṭikā vajravad bhavet // Ras_12.171 //
GS40rasarnpu:2441: milanti sarvalohāni dravanti salilaṃ yathā // Ras_12.173 //
GS40rasarnpu:2444: śākavṛkṣasya niryāsaṃ pattre tasya ca gālayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2445: śigrumūlasya cūrṇaṃ tu tadrasena vimardayet // Ras_12.175 //
GS40rasarnpu:2449: tadrasena yutaṃ prājñaḥ saptarātraṃ tu bhāvayet // Ras_12.177 //
GS40rasarnpu:2451: lepayet tārapattrāṇi dhmātaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.178 //
GS40rasarnpu:2453: sā śvetā vyādhināśe ca kṛṣṇā pītā rasāyane // Ras_12.179 //
GS40rasarnpu:2457: mūrchayed bandhayet kṣipraṃ śulvaṃ hema karoti ca // Ras_12.181 //
GS40rasarnpu:2459: toyena marditaṃ kṛtvā vaṅgaṃ stambhayati kṣaṇāt // Ras_12.182 //
GS40rasarnpu:2460: ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi śvetaguñjāvidhiṃ priye // Ras_12.183 //
GS40rasarnpu:2462: kapāle mṛttikāṃ nyasya secayet salilena tu // Ras_12.184 //
GS40rasarnpu:2464: vakṣyamāṇena mantreṇa kuryāt saṃgrahaṇaṃ tathā // Ras_12.185 //
GS40rasarnpu:2465: namo bhagavati śvetavalli śvetaparvatavāsini sarvakāryāṇi kuru kuru apratihate namo namaḥ svāhā |
GS40rasarnpu:2467: ṣaṇmāsena tathā vallīṃ mantrapūtena rakṣayet // Ras_12.186 //
GS40rasarnpu:2468: śuddhaśulvaṃ tu saṃgṛhya mūṣāmadhye tu saṃsthitam /
GS40rasarnpu:2472: devānāṃ bhūṣaṇaṃ devi jāyate hema śobhanam // Ras_12.188 //
GS40rasarnpu:2480: nirgacchati mahīṃ bhittvā candravṛddhyā vivardhate // Ras_12.192 //
GS40rasarnpu:2483: ahorātroṣito bhūtvā baliṃ tatra nivedayet // Ras_12.193 //
GS40rasarnpu:2484: pūrṇamāsyāṃ ca rātrau ca gatvā tasya samīpataḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2488: candrodaye tato dṛṣṭe kṣīraṃ tasya tu dāpayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2492: candrodakena gaganaṃ rasaṃ hema ca mardayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2494: ayaṃ ca sparśamātreṇa lohānyaṣṭau ca vedhayet // Ras_12.198 //
GS40rasarnpu:2496: catuḥṣaṣṭyaṃśataḥ piṇḍe dviguṇe tu sahasrakam // Ras_12.199 //
GS40rasarnpu:2498: trilohaveṣṭitaṃ vaktre dhṛtvā cādṛśyatāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.200 //
GS40rasarnpu:2499: oṃ namo rudrāya daṃṣṭrotkaṭāya vighnanāśāya diśāṃ rakṣa rakṣa vidiśāṃ rakṣa rakṣa rudro vijñāpayati huṃ phaṭ svāhā |
GS40rasarnpu:2500: oṃ namo bhagavate rudrāya triśūlahastāya amṛtodbhavāya rakṣa rakṣa phaṭ svāhā |
GS40rasarnpu:2505: te bhūmau patitā divyāḥ saṃjātāḥ kartarīrasaḥ // Ras_12.203 //
GS40rasarnpu:2506: rakṣārthaṃ sthāpitaṃ tatra viṣṇunā ca sudarśanam /
GS40rasarnpu:2508: kurute garjitaṃ nādaṃ dhūmaṃ jvālāṃ vimuñcati /
GS40rasarnpu:2511: sā jvālākartarī caiva śaktirghorasya kartarī // Ras_12.206 //
GS40rasarnpu:2513: rasarūpā mahāghorā asiddhānāṃ tu chedinī // Ras_12.207 //
GS40rasarnpu:2514: tasyāḥ kṣetraṃ yadā gacchet aghorāstraṃ japettadā /
GS40rasarnpu:2517: mudrayā mudrayettāṃ tu aghorāstreṇa yojitām // Ras_12.209 //
GS40rasarnpu:2519: viṣṭarāmudrayā tāṃ tu sthānayogaṃ niyojayet // Ras_12.210 //
GS40rasarnpu:2520: kañcukī tu śilā krāntā kumārī vajrakandakam /
GS40rasarnpu:2521: yoṣidraktaṃ gavāṃ mūtraṃ tilakaḥ sarvavaśyakṛt // Ras_12.211 //
GS40rasarnpu:2526: keśāḥ kṣiptāḥ sphuṭantyasmin ātmacchāyā na dṛśyate // Ras_12.214 //
GS40rasarnpu:2527: tailaṃ ca golakākāraṃ ghṛtaṃ caiva visarpati /
GS40rasarnpu:2528: gandhakasya haredgandhaṃ lavaṇāmlaṃ ca jāyate // Ras_12.215 //
GS40rasarnpu:2530: viṣodakaṃ gandhakaṃ ca harabījaṃ ca tatsamam // Ras_12.216 //
GS40rasarnpu:2534: anena vidhinā devi nāgaḥ sindūratāṃ vrajet /
GS40rasarnpu:2535: sahasrāṃśena tasyaivaṃ tāraṃ vedhaṃ pradāpayet // Ras_12.218 //
GS40rasarnpu:2536: raktaṃ pītaṃ tathā kṛṣṇam uttarottarakāryakṛt // Ras_12.219 //
GS40rasarnpu:2538: gṛhītvā pūrvavat pattraiḥ pālāśair veṣṭayedbahiḥ // Ras_12.220 //
GS40rasarnpu:2540: mahiṣīkṣīramadhye tu bindumekaṃ tu sādhayet // Ras_12.221 //
GS40rasarnpu:2544: meṣaśṛṅgīṃ ca śṛṅgīṃ ca kṛṣṇonmattaṃ ca mārakam // Ras_12.223:1 //
GS40rasarnpu:2548: tena nāgaṃ pratīvāpya ṣoḍaśāṃśena sambhavet // Ras_12.224 //
GS40rasarnpu:2552: taccūrṇaṃ tu śatāṃśena tārapattrāṇi vedhayet // Ras_12.226 //
GS40rasarnpu:2554: niṣiktaṃ tacca varte 'yaṃ tāraṃ bhavati śobhanam // Ras_12.227 //
GS40rasarnpu:2558: andhamūṣāgataṃ dhmātaṃ nirbījaṃ kanakaṃ bhavet // Ras_12.228:2 //
GS40rasarnpu:2564: etat kalkaṃ palamātraṃ cauṣadhyā lepanaṃ kuru /
GS40rasarnpu:2565: niryāse tu puṭaṃ kuryāt trivāraṃ hema śobhanam // Ras_12.231 //
GS40rasarnpu:2570: tayā saṃjīvitā daityā ye mṛtā devasaṃgare // Ras_12.234 //
GS40rasarnpu:2571: nikṣiptā martyaloke sā samyak te kathayāmyaham // Ras_12.235 //
GS40rasarnpu:2573: nadī godāvarī nāma prasiddhā jāhnavī yathā // Ras_12.236 //
GS40rasarnpu:2574: dakṣiṇe ca taṭe tasyāḥ kadalīnagaraṃ param /
GS40rasarnpu:2575: tasya dakṣiṇataḥ śailaḥ sarvalokeṣu viśrutaḥ // Ras_12.237 //
GS40rasarnpu:2584: tasya mantraṃ pravakṣyāmi triṣu lokeṣu durlabham // Ras_12.242 //
GS40rasarnpu:2585: oṃ caṇḍāya pinākine śūlahastāya oṃ diśāṃ bandhaya vidiśāṃ bandhaya ṭhaṭhaḥ |
GS40rasarnpu:2590: oṃ namo 'mṛte 'mṛtarūpiṇi amṛtaṃ me kuru kuru evaṃ rudra ājñāpayati svāhā |
GS40rasarnpu:2595: jīvet kalpāyutaṃ sāgraṃ kāmarūpo mahābalaḥ // Ras_12.246 //
GS40rasarnpu:2597: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ svecchācāraḥ sa khecaraḥ // Ras_12.247 //
GS40rasarnpu:2599: mardayettena toyena saptavāraṃ tu svedayet // Ras_12.248 //
GS40rasarnpu:2600: sa rasaḥ sarvalohāni ṣaṣṭyaṃśena tu vedhayet // Ras_12.249 //
GS40rasarnpu:2601: athavā taṃ rasaṃ divyaṃ madhunā saha bhakṣayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2603: tasya mūtramalasvedaiḥ śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.251 //
GS40rasarnpu:2605: pītamātre bhavenmūrchā svāsthyaṃ syāt praharatrayāt // Ras_12.252 //
GS40rasarnpu:2612: svedayet saptarātraṃ tu trilohena ca veṣṭayet // Ras_12.256 //
GS40rasarnpu:2616: payasā ca samāyuktaṃ nityamevaṃ tu kārayet // Ras_12.258 //
GS40rasarnpu:2618: paśyeduṣṇodakaṃ yatra vāsaṃ tatraiva kārayet // Ras_12.259 //
GS40rasarnpu:2620: tasyā uttarabhāge tu sahyādriḥ puṇyaparvataḥ // Ras_12.260 //
GS40rasarnpu:2622: tasmāduttarato devi kampākhyaṃ nagaraṃ param // Ras_12.261 //
GS40rasarnpu:2624: praṇītākhyā nadī tatra snātvā vai sādhakottamaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2625: paścāduṣṇodake kuṇḍe vidhiṃ kuryād yathoditaḥ // Ras_12.262 //
GS40rasarnpu:2631: tasya mūtrapurīṣeṇa śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.265 //
GS40rasarnpu:2634: śulvaṃ ca mardayet sarvaṃ naṣṭapiṣṭaṃ kṣaṇena tu /
GS40rasarnpu:2635: tena lepitamātreṇa śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.267 //
GS40rasarnpu:2636: niṣiktaṃ tena toyena prativāpaṃ daded budhaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2637: śulvaṃ ca jāyate hema taruṇādityavarcasam // Ras_12.268 //
GS40rasarnpu:2639: tāraṃ cānena mārgeṇa niṣiktaṃ hematāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.269 //
GS40rasarnpu:2647: uṣṇodakena saṃmardya dhamanāt khoṭatāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.273 //
GS40rasarnpu:2650: yāvat palaṃ tasya malaiḥ śulvaṃ bhavati kāñcanam // Ras_12.274 //
GS40rasarnpu:2654: pāyasaṃ kāntapātre tan māsam ekaṃ tu bhakṣayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2655: bhuktvā jīvet kalpaśataṃ vaiṣṇavāyur bhavennaraḥ // Ras_12.276 //
GS40rasarnpu:2657: kardamāpo mahīśailaṃ śilaṃ ceti caturvidham // Ras_12.277 //
GS40rasarnpu:2660: kṣiptaṃ yadā bhavet kāṣṭhaṃ śailībhūtaṃ ca dṛśyate /
GS40rasarnpu:2661: bahirantaśca deveśi vedhakaṃ tat prakīrtitam // Ras_12.279 //
GS40rasarnpu:2662: hiṅgulaṃ haritālaṃ ca gandhakaṃ ca manaḥśilā /
GS40rasarnpu:2663: eṣāṃ gandhāpahāraṃ yat kurute tacca vedhakam // Ras_12.280 //
GS40rasarnpu:2664: gandhakaṃ tālakaṃ caiva toyapūrṇe ghaṭe kṣipet /
GS40rasarnpu:2666: anyathā veṣṭakaṃ devi tadagrāhyaṃ nirarthakam // Ras_12.281 //
GS40rasarnpu:2669: ekāhe vedhakaṃ tatra gokarṇe tu dinatrayam // Ras_12.282 //
GS40rasarnpu:2671: dhāreśvare pākṣikaṃ syāt varṣāpuryāṃ dinaikataḥ // Ras_12.283 //
GS40rasarnpu:2672: brahmeśvare māsikaṃ syāt vyāghrapuryāṃ tu vāsaram /
GS40rasarnpu:2673: aghoreśe māsikaṃ tu siṃhadvīpe tathā punaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2674: dinamekaṃ brahmagirau vindhye tu kṣaṇavedhakam // Ras_12.284 //
GS40rasarnpu:2678: bhūśailamasti tatraiva tridinaṃ vedhi parvate // Ras_12.286 //
GS40rasarnpu:2683: amṛtaṃ tatra tatrāpi vajrīkaraṇam uttamam // Ras_12.288 //
GS40rasarnpu:2684: tasyotpattiṃ pravakṣyāmi yathā jānanti sādhakāḥ // Ras_12.289 //
GS40rasarnpu:2686: yaḥ svedaḥ patitastasmāj jātaṃ śailodakaṃ param // Ras_12.290 //
GS40rasarnpu:2687: tanmukhe kṣaṇikaṃ jātaṃ kroḍadeśe tu vāsaram /
GS40rasarnpu:2688: bāhubhyāṃ tryahavedhi syāt māsavedhi tu pārśvayoḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2689: ṣaṇmāsamaparāṅge ca sarvaṃ samaphalaṃ bhavet // Ras_12.291 //
GS40rasarnpu:2690: aghorāstreṇa tatkṣetra- rakṣāṃ kṛtvā diśāṃ balim /
GS40rasarnpu:2691: dattvā lakṣaṃ japitvā tu gṛhṇīyādamṛtaṃ param // Ras_12.292 //
GS40rasarnpu:2694: śailāmbupalamaṣṭau tu palaṃ kṣīrasya nikṣipet // Ras_12.293 //
GS40rasarnpu:2698: kṣīrāvaśeṣaṃ seveta pūrvoktaṃ labhate phalam // Ras_12.295 //
GS40rasarnpu:2703: dvir aṣṭavarṣakākāraḥ sahasrāyur na saṃśayaḥ // Ras_12.297 //
GS40rasarnpu:2705: bhakṣayed varṣam ekaṃ tu māsenāyutajīvitaḥ // Ras_12.298 //
GS40rasarnpu:2707: māsamekaṃ tato mardyaṃ dehasiddhiṃ karoti ca // Ras_12.299 //
GS40rasarnpu:2712: athavā sūtakaṃ devi vāriṇā saha mardayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2715: athavā taṃ rasaṃ hemnā hemabhasma tato balī /
GS40rasarnpu:2718: kartā hartā svayaṃ siddho jīveccandrārkatārakam // Ras_12.305 //
GS40rasarnpu:2719: kunaṭī cābhramākṣīkaṃ hema tāraṃ tathaiva ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2720: tat sarvaṃ payasā kṣīrair madyaṃ pācyaṃ dinatrayam /
GS40rasarnpu:2724: paktvā tenāmbhasā pathyāḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ trīṇi śatāni ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2725: madhu saṃyojya bhāṇḍasthaṃ bhūmau sarvaṃ nidhāpayet // Ras_12.308 //
GS40rasarnpu:2730: kūṣmāṇḍaṃ māritaṃ kṛtvā yāni kāni phalāni ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2737: kālena triguṇenaiva kāṭhinyaṃ tasya jāyate // Ras_12.313 //
GS40rasarnpu:2738: ṣaṇmāsaṃ tanmukhe dhāryaṃ vajrakāyaṃ karoti ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2739: daśanāgasamaprāṇo devaiḥ saha ca modate // Ras_12.314 //
GS40rasarnpu:2741: yadā bhavati tacchailaṃ gṛhītvā cūrṇayet tataḥ // Ras_12.315 //
GS40rasarnpu:2743: bhakṣayedvarṣamekaṃ tu tataḥ kṣīrāśano bhavet // Ras_12.316 //
GS40rasarnpu:2746: pāradaṃ haritālaṃ ca śilā mākṣikameva ca /
GS40rasarnpu:2747: daradaṃ ca viṣaṃ caiva sarvamekatra kārayet // Ras_12.318 //
GS40rasarnpu:2749: golakaṃ kārayitvā tu vārimadhye nidhāpayet // Ras_12.319 //
GS40rasarnpu:2750: tena tāraṃ ca śulvaṃ ca kāñcanaṃ bhavati dhruvam // Ras_12.320 //
GS40rasarnpu:2756: jñātvā kālapramāṇena bandhayet pāradaṃ tataḥ // Ras_12.323 //
GS40rasarnpu:2758: śatāṃśena tu lohānāṃ sarveṣāṃ hemakārakam // Ras_12.324 //
GS40rasarnpu:2760: tatkālaṃ cittajātānām ūrdhvaṃ bhavati cānilaḥ // Ras_12.325 //
GS40rasarnpu:2763: taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre divyatvaṃ labhate dhruvam // Ras_12.327 //
GS40rasarnpu:2764: nicule kakubhe caiva kiṃśuke madhuke 'pi vā /
GS40rasarnpu:2767: pācayeddinamekaṃ tu hemnā saṃveṣṭya dhārayet // Ras_12.329 //
GS40rasarnpu:2769: pādena kanakaṃ dattvā pāradaṃ tatra yojayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2771: pūrvavat sāraṇā kāryā pūrvavat siddhidā bhavet /
GS40rasarnpu:2772: dhāryamāṇā mukhe sā tu sahasrāyuṣkarī bhavet // Ras_12.331 //
GS40rasarnpu:2774: dhāryamāṇā mukhe seyam ayutāyuḥpradā bhavet // Ras_12.332 //
GS40rasarnpu:2776: taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre lakṣāyurjāyate naraḥ // Ras_12.333 //
GS40rasarnpu:2777: caturthīṃ sāraṇāṃ prāpya koṭivedho na saṃśayaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2778: koṭyāyurjīvitaṃ tasya khecaratvaṃ ca labhyate // Ras_12.334 //
GS40rasarnpu:2779: pañcabhir daśakoṭiḥ syāt ṣaḍbhiḥ koṭiśataṃ bhavet /
GS40rasarnpu:2781: dadāti saptamīṃ sāpi sāraṇāṃ guṭikā parā /
GS40rasarnpu:2782: khecarī nāma vikhyātā bhairaveṇa pracoditā // Ras_12.336 //
GS40rasarnpu:2785: krīḍate khecarair bhogaiḥ svecchayā śivatāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.337 //
GS40rasarnpu:2787: tadbaddhaṃ pāradaṃ caiva guṭikāṃ śṛṇu sundari // Ras_12.338 //
GS40rasarnpu:2789: triguṇe gandhake jīrṇe tena hema tu kārayet // Ras_12.339 //
GS40rasarnpu:2790: kārayedbhasma sūtaṃ tu kāñcanaṃ tatra sūtakam /
GS40rasarnpu:2791: tadbhasma sūtake jāryaṃ rasendrasya same samam // Ras_12.340 //
GS40rasarnpu:2794: tadbhasma jārayate sūte triguṇe tu surārcite /
GS40rasarnpu:2795: hāṭake sārayettaṃ tu guṭikāṃ tena kārayet // Ras_12.342 //
GS40rasarnpu:2796: trilohāveṣṭitaṃ taṃ tu mukhe prakṣipya sādhakaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2797: naṣṭacchāyo bhavet so 'yam adṛśyo devadānavaiḥ // Ras_12.343 //
GS40rasarnpu:2801: vaktre kare ca bibhṛyāt sarvāyudhanivāraṇāt // Ras_12.345 //
GS40rasarnpu:2805: vaktrasthā nāśayet sākṣāt palitaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2807: hema tāraṃ tathā bhānuṃ samabhāgāni kārayet /
GS40rasarnpu:2810: raṇe rājakule dyūte divye kāmye jayo bhavet /
GS40rasarnpu:2811: yanmukhe caiva tadgolaṃ sa sarvarañjako bhavet // Ras_12.349 //
GS40rasarnpu:2816: rogamṛtyujarā hanti vaktrasthā nātra saṃśayaḥ // Ras_12.351 //
GS40rasarnpu:2818: trayo gaganabhāgāḥ syur ekaikaṃ hemakāntayoḥ // Ras_12.352 //
GS40rasarnpu:2823: mākṣikasya palaṃ caiva śilājatupalaṃ punaḥ // Ras_12.354 //
GS40rasarnpu:2825: ekīkṛtyātha tat sarvaṃ madhvājyena tu peṣayet // Ras_12.355 //
GS40rasarnpu:2831: āmalakyādi kāntaṃ ca pāradaṃ ca manaḥśilām /
GS40rasarnpu:2834: māṣaṃ trimāṣaṃ triguṇaṃ bhakṣayettu krameṇa tu /
GS40rasarnpu:2836: ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau ca varṣāṇi kramān niṣkapramāṇataḥ /
GS40rasarnpu:2837: bhuñjīta sa ca divyānnaṃ jarāvairūpyavarjitaḥ // Ras_12.361 //
GS40rasarnpu:2839: yo bhakṣayet tribhirvarṣaiḥ sarvavyādhīn jayatyalam // Ras_12.362 //
GS40rasarnpu:2841: ṣoḍaśe vatsare devi divyarūpaḥ sa jāyate // Ras_12.363 //
GS40rasarnpu:2842: śatapalam abhayānām akṣadhātryos tathaiva kvathitajalaśatāṣṭau bhāgamaṣṭāvaśeṣam /
GS40rasarnpu:2843: ghṛtamadhusitayāḍhyaṃ vyoṣacitraṃ daśāṃśaṃ rasaphalarasasiddhaṃ lohajīrṇaṃ mṛtaṃ ca // Ras_12.364 //
GS40rasarnpu:2847: vigatasakaladoṣaḥ sarvadigdivyacakṣuḥ madana iva sukāntiḥ kāminīnāṃ pravīraḥ // Ras_12.366 //
GS40rasarnpu:2849: vṛṣabhagativiceṣṭaḥ snigdhagambhīraghoṣaḥ suragaja iva loke śrāntihantāśu nityam // Ras_12.367 //
GS40rasarnpu:2850: prabhavati khalu loke somatārārkajīvī kamalasadanasuśrīr nyāyaśāstrādivettā /
GS40rasarnpu:2853: śailavārivarasiddhagolakaṃ sundaraṃ hy amararañjakaṃ śubham // Ras_12.369 //
GS40rasarnpu:2856: śailatāṃ gatamathāhitaṃ mukhe vajrakāyakaram alpavāsaraiḥ // Ras_12.370 //
GS40rasarnpu:2860: triḥsaptarātraṃ dinamekamekaṃ sahasrajīvī vijayī naraḥ syāt // Ras_12.372 //
GS40rasarnpu:2862: hāṭakena samāyuktaṃ guṭikā khecarī bhavet // Ras_12.373 //
GS40rasarnpu:2870: triṃśatsahasraṃ padme ca lakṣamāmalake punaḥ // Ras_12.377 //
GS40rasarnpu:2874: rase rasāyane caiva lakṣavedhī na saṃśayaḥ // Ras_12.379 //
GS40rasarnpu:2877: ṣaṇmāsena prayogeṇa hy ajarāmaratāṃ vrajet // Ras_12.380 //
GS40rasarnpu:2879: taṃ khoṭaṃ dhārayedvaktre adṛśyo bhavati dhruvam // Ras_12.381 //
GS40rasarnpu:2881: rasenaiva tu kāle tu kuryādeva rasāyanam // Ras_12.382 //
